definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: It was almost impossible to get a car mended in Lundazi, or even to replace a battery.
sentences.chinese: 在倫達孜你休想修車，連換電池都辦不到。

sentences.english: Others like to work on their own vehicles. Not Mitsuaki.
sentences.chinese: 有些人則喜歡自己動手修車。

sentences.english: What about a good Volvo mechanic?
sentences.chinese: 滿意的沃爾沃修車師傅呢？

sentences.english: Then, I drove my car to the mechanics in front of my home.
sentences.chinese: 接着我把車開到我家對面的修車店裏。

sentences.english: The garage said they'd send me an estimate for the work.
sentences.chinese: 汽車修理行說他們會給我寄來一份修車估價表。

sentences.english: I want to repair my car right now rather than when I have time some day.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願現在立刻修車而不願等以後有空時再去修。

sentences.english: Are the repairs worth the money based on the car’s overall worth?
sentences.chinese: 修車的錢和在這輛車上的總體花費來看值不值得？

sentences.english: And we just installed a ray on a roof of the Coney Island maintenance shop.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛剛在科尼島維修車間的屋頂上安裝了輻射板。

sentences.english: Notify the responsible maintenance shop or take ladder to that shop for immediate inspection or repair.
sentences.chinese: 通知或送到相關維修車間立即進行檢查和維修。

sentences.english: Tom has gained the ability of mending fences and repairing cars from his parents.
sentences.chinese: 因爲張老三修柵欄，修車的本事是他的父母教的。

sentences.english: I have to take it into the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我得把車弄到修車鋪去。

sentences.english: Across town, we visit Penrith Brake and Clutch Service.
sentences.chinese: 在潘瑞思鎮，我們採訪了潘瑞思剎車與離合器修車行。

sentences.english: Is there a garage around where I can get my car repaired?
sentences.chinese: 這附近哪裏有修車廠可以修理我的車？

sentences.english: I pushed the bike along the streets, looking for a repair shop.
sentences.chinese: 我沿着街推着自行車，尋找一個修車店。

sentences.english: He's talking through his hat if he says they'll fix your car for free.
sentences.chinese: 他說的他們會免費跟你修車的話就像高帽一樣空虛。

sentences.english: You make it stable and at rest so you can then work on repair.
sentences.chinese: 先讓車停下來，這樣才能修車。

definition: (of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
to discard in the wrong place (cigarette butts etc)/to leave one's things lying around
